(Inside Train Wreck)

Stranato: Now what are we going to do? The Maximals a=
llied with those Chivtron things!

Airbomber: We kill them all! Nobody will=
 stand in our way!

Stronghold: Who votes that we throw Airbomber out on hi=
s ass?

Airbomber: Wait a minute, my idea is the best, I'm leader!

Deemos:=
 It's just become too hectic, Airbomber. The Chivtrons have gotten too good=
 and too smart. It would be unwise to go behind the Maximal's backs and att=
ack them.

Airbomber: I can't believe what I'm hearing!

Rizopas: Yeah, I k=
now. That Chivtron kid really let me have it before, and I wanted to let hi=
m have it.

Stranato: One thing to do. Ally with the Chivtrons.

Deemos: No=
t me, I need to find something else to do. No more attacking, but I'm think=
ing of challenging the one to a battle.

Holocaust: It was going so good. S=
o good, want to kill.

Blender: WHICH one?

Deemos: Perplex. I was thinking=
 that he'd fight me to the death with no interference. Or maybe him vs. Sha=
rpedge. Sharpedge is actually a better fighter than I am.

Holocaust: If on=
ly I got that girl.

Doom Ice: I just hope that the Maximals leave us alone=
.

Stranato: Don't worry. The only thing we need to worry about is Airbombe=
r.

Airbomber: Me? Well let me tell you something,--

Stranato: No.

Airbom=
ber: I talk when I want to!

Stronghold: That poll is still on.

Airbomber:=
 No it isn't! It's my team! Mine mine mine mine mine!...
  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Su=
nday, July 15, 2001 7:16 PM
  Subject: Hot heads in battle


  ::Hot Rod/Cl=
eder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

  He watched as Gemeni Dragon shots onc=
e more.
  "Damn it, stop! Why do you all want to continue a pointless battl=
e out
  of confusion?"

  Cleder spoke up.
  "If this continues we will be =
forced to defend them. They are Maximals
  after all."

  "Lets get out of =
here," said Hot Rod.

  They all transformed and headed back to Maximal Cit=
y, with Train Wreck
  and the others.

   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is =
subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
